title: Fell for a scam got account hacked please help me
body: i really need your help i dont know how to contact riot for this

replies.body: i would really appreciate it if i got some help i put money into the game
Putting money into the game doesn't put you higher on the "help priority list". Submit a ticket like BroPoro has suggested.

No worries just yet buddy! Reach out to our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking "I need help recovering my account" and they'll be able to start the verification process to get your account back.
